mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CommunityReply(replyNum, communityNum, studentId, subject, content, groupNum, depth, orderNo, parent, reg_date) VALUES (#{replyNum}, #{communityNum}, #{studentId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{groupNum}, #{depth}, #{orderNo}, #{parent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM communityReply c JOIN schoolMember m ON c.studentId = m.userId

SELECT replyNum, communityNum, studentId, content, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date, TO_CHAR(modify_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS modify_date, groupNum, orderNo, depth FROM communityReply c JOIN schoolMember m ON c.studentId = m.studentId
ORDER BY groupNum DESC, orderNo ASC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT replyNum, communityNum, studentId, content, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date, groupNum, depth, orderNo, parent FROM communityReply c JOIN schoolMember m ON c.studentId = m.userId WHERE replyNum = #{replyNum}

SELECT replyNum, subject FROM communityReply c schoolMember m ON c.studentId = m.userId
AND ( (groupNum = #{groupNum} AND orderNo < #{orderNo}) OR (groupNum > #{groupNum}) )
ORDER BY groupNum ASC, orderNo DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT replyNum, subject FROM communityReply c JOIN schoolMember m ON c.studentId = m.userId
AND ( (groupNum = #{groupNum} AND orderNo > #{orderNo}) OR (groupNum < #{groupNum}) )
ORDER BY groupNum ASC, orderNo DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE communityReply SET orderNo = orderNo + 1 WHERE groupNum = #{groupNum} AND orderNo > #{orderNo}
UPDATE communityReply SET subject = #{subject}, content = #{content} WHERE replyNum = #{replyNum} AND studentId = #{studentId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM communityReply WHERE replyNum IN ( SELECT replyNum FROM communityReply START WITH replyNum = #{replyNum} CONNECT BY PRIOR replyNum = parent )
